name: Brooks Addiction GTS Men's Supportive Running Shoe
description: A supportive running shoe designed to deliver exceptional cushioning, stability, and comfort for overpronators during long runs.
longDescription: The Brooks Addiction GTS Men's Supportive Running Shoe is engineered for runners who demand stability without sacrificing cushioning. Its innovative midsole technology helps reduce overpronation while providing a responsive, adaptive ride. Designed with a secure fit and durable construction, this shoe offers excellent support for long-distance training and everyday workouts. Whether youâ€™re tackling marathon distances or casual jogs, the Brooks Addiction GTS delivers performance, comfort, and lasting support.

features.title: Stability & Support
features.description: Wider platform than other options designed for enhanced stability/balance.

features.title: Comfortable Fit
features.description: Bigger toe box with more space for bunions and hammertoes.

features.title: Durable Construction
features.description: High-quality materials and robust design ensure long-lasting performance.

pros: Wider platform than other options designed for  enhanced stability/balance
Bigger toe box with more space for bunions and hammertoes
Durable design built to withstand rigorous training
